title: Clara Barton National Historic Site: Park Home
body: She was a remarkable person  Clara Barton dedicated her life and energies to help others in times of need - both home and abroad, in peacetime as well as during military emergencies. Glen Echo was her home the last 15 years of her life and the structure illustrates her dedication and concern for those less fortunate than herself. Read More             American Red Cross Staff Office   Take a Virtual Tour of Clara Barton National Historic Site or complete the educational activities and earn a Junior Ranger Badge.
